item.title: @elonmusk: ELON MUSK: "I do see a path to 100 gigawatts a year of AI powered space solar satellites. If you do ...
item.description: ELON MUSK: "I do see a path to 100 gigawatts a year of AI powered space solar satellites. If you do a million tons of payload to orbit per year with 100 kilowatts per ton, that's 100 gigawatts of solar powered AI satellites per year. There's a path to get to a terawatt per year, then you want to make those AI satellites on the moon and use a mass driver. We should scale solar substantially in the US. Tesla and SpaceX are scaling solar, and I encourage others to do so as well."

item.title: @elonmusk: Elon Musk is operating on another timeline right now. We are living through perhaps the most pivotal...
item.description: Elon Musk is operating on another timeline right now. We are living through perhaps the most pivotal moment in humanity. Optimism is a beautiful thing.

item.title: @elonmusk: SpaceX says it aims to deploy up to 1 million orbital satellite data centers in space to provide eno...
item.description: SpaceX says it aims to deploy up to 1 million orbital satellite data centers in space to provide enough compute power for large-scale AI inference and training. ‚Ä¢ Satellites will get constant power in space. ‚Ä¢ No batteries are needed. ‚Ä¢ No glass framing required, which makes the solar panels cheaper to produce. ‚Ä¢ Passive Radiative cooling Elon says space will be the lowest-cost place to put AI within 3 years.

item.title: @elonmusk: Awesome detail from the SpaceX orbital datacenter filing - heliocentric disposal of satellites at th...
item.description: Awesome detail from the SpaceX orbital datacenter filing - heliocentric disposal of satellites at their end of life. This is necessary long term and is something we've been talking about for a while. You can't re-enter that amount of mass without causing problems.

item.title: @elonmusk: Solar is not A source of energy, it is THE source of energy
item.description: Solar is not A source of energy, it is THE source of energy

item.title: @elonmusk: That is the key question. Epstein and Maxwell were sent to prison for running an underage child sex ...
item.description: That is the key question. Epstein and Maxwell were sent to prison for running an underage child sex ring. Prosecute their clients!!! Until we see at least one client arrest, this partial release of Epstein files means nothing.

item.title: @elonmusk: Oops, did I say 1 million? I meant to say 1 billion.
item.description: Oops, did I say 1 million? I meant to say 1 billion.

item.description: "AI and humanoid robots will actually eliminate poverty. There is only one way to make everyone wealthy, & that is AI & robotics." ‰∏Ä Elon Musk

item.description: There will be thousands of court cases of children who were mutilated by evil doctors, modern day Mengeles. The schools, psychologists/psychiatrists and state officials who facilitated this will pay dearly too.

item.title: @elonmusk: RINOs call for smaller government, but tonight these 11 Republicans voted to keep the gravy train go...
item.description: RINOs call for smaller government, but tonight these 11 Republicans voted to keep the gravy train going for the African Development Foundation. item.title: @elonmusk: BREAKING: Grokipedia is now referenced in more than 250,000 responses from other AIs, citing over 90...
item.description: BREAKING: Grokipedia is now referenced in more than 250,000 responses from other AIs, citing over 90,000 individual Grokipedia pages. This growth shows how quickly Grokipedia is embedding itself into the internet‚Äôs knowledge layer.

item.title: @elonmusk: 10 TIMES NVIDIA To put 100 GW/per year of AI computers in perspective, Grok estimates Nvidia is pres...
item.description: 10 TIMES NVIDIA To put 100 GW/per year of AI computers in perspective, Grok estimates Nvidia is presently at 10GW/per year in AI compute. IE 10X Nvidia. 100 TRILLION COMPANY Now you see why Elon Musk says a 100 Trillion market cap company may be possible within 10 years. SpaceX, xAI and Tesla will all play major roles in AI Space Compute.

item.title: @elonmusk: Grok‚Äôs video generation limits crush the competition. SuperGrok (Premium+/equivalent) gives you 100‚Äì...
item.description: Grok‚Äôs video generation limits crush the competition. SuperGrok (Premium+/equivalent) gives you 100‚Äì200 videos/day ‚Äî hundreds more than Google‚Äôs plans. SuperGrok Heavy pushes it to 500‚Äì1000 videos/day. Google? Severely restricted: ‚Ä¢Google AI Pro: ~3 videos/day (Veo 3.1 Fast preview) ‚Ä¢Google AI Ultra: ~5 videos/day (Veo 3.1 preview) Grok lets creators go wild without rationing ‚Äî single digits vs. hundreds/thousands. Night and day difference. üöÄ

item.title: @elonmusk: What matters is not release of some subset of the Epstein files, but rather the prosecution of those...
item.description: What matters is not release of some subset of the Epstein files, but rather the prosecution of those who committed heinous crimes with Epstein. When there is at least one arrest, some justice will have been done. If not, this is all performative. Nothing but a distraction.
